name: Umbra: Glitters Shadow
description:
Made with Permission from the Famicart Artist: Curtis Dickie

https://www.instagram.com/p/B_yMvp8gK4S/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_link

This prototype is quite bare in this state (making games is hard!) But it demonstrates some of the basics I envisioned for this game idea. After the Famicart 2021 Jam ends, I am moving it to Godot engine where I have technical prototypes of screen flipping (TopDown Zelda Style) as well as 2D lighting effects such as shadows and revealing otherwise invisible sprites. I actually have been thinking about this since Curtis uploaded his Famicart design for 2020, so it's definitely something I will continue to work on at my admittedly bad pace.
